text: Michael Noonan (born 21 May 1943) is an Irish former Fine Gael politician who was the Minister for Finance from 2011 to 2017. He also was the Leader of the Opposition and Leader of Fine Gael from 2001 to 2002. Noonan was also the Minister for Health from 1994 to 1997, Minister for Industry and Commerce from 1986 to 1987, Minister for Energy from January 1987 to March 1987 and Minister for Justice from 1982 to 1986. He was a Teachta DÃ¡la (TD) from 1981 to 2020. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Members of Fine Gael Category:People from Limerick Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Ireland) Category:Government ministers of Ireland
title: Michael Noonan
